content:
TrackingMode Enum

Definition

Determines whether changes that are made to a stem.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1 are tracked.

In this Article

public enum TrackingMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
TrackingMode

Remarks

The TrackingMode enumeration specifies whether or not changes that are made to items in the collection are tracked automatically.

Values from the TrackingMode enumeration are used when you create a new instance of the DataServiceCollection<T> class.

Fields

AutoChangeTracking

Changes to items in the stem.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1 are automatically tracked by the client.
None

Changes made to items in the stem.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1 are not tracked automatically by the client.
